column1: Dondo is a city and district Dondo District of Sofala Province in Mozambique.
Dondo has a cement works which used limestone mined at Muanza.
Dondo has one of two concrete sleeper plants
column2: the other being at Vila de Sena.

column1: Dondo has factory building cement vulgar Lusalite materials.
Dondo has a station on the Mozambican rail network
column2: where the line to Malawi and Moatize junctions from the line to Zimbabwe.
